home.fleurieDescrizioni: Precious stones, refined cuts, embody elegance
home.zingaraDescrizioni: The purity of gold and hammered finish in a fascinating play of light and movement
home.meetingTraditionInnovation: A meeting of tradition and innovation, incredible wearable artworks
home.welcomeYou: We would be delighted to welcome you to discover and try on our favorite creations.

prodotti.bracelets_description: Cusi bracelets, original and sophisticated, add a touch of distinctive elegance to the wrist. Each piece is carefully crafted to offer refined and timeless style.
prodotti.rings_description: Explore the Cusi ring collection, finely crafted with high-quality materials and adorned with sparkling stones and precious gems. Each ring is a unique masterpiece that enhances the beauty of its wearer.
prodotti.necklaces_description: Cusi necklaces embody unmistakable vitality and luminosity, enhancing the neckline with precious materials and sophisticated design. Perfect for those who wish to express a brilliant personality.
prodotti.earrings_description: Cusi earrings, shining and refined, capture the essence of elegance. With intricate details and a touch of luxury, each pair illuminates the wearer's face, transforming every moment into a celebration of style.
prodotti.enamelledchains_description: Vibrant and sophisticated, Cusi enamelled chains add a touch of color and uniqueness to every look. Perfect for those who wish to stand out with style.
prodotti.animals_description: Detailed and fascinating animal sculptures by Cusi bring a touch of nature and craftsmanship mastery to any environment. Perfect for those who love art and the beauty of the animal kingdom.
prodotti.sea_description: Cusi sea-inspired jewelry, evoking the beauty of oceans, enchant with the waves' charm and the serenity of coasts. Ideal for those who wish to carry a piece of the sea wherever they go.
prodotti.zingara_description: The softness of gold and hammered finish bring to life a fascinating play of light and movement.
prodotti.tycoon_description: Elegance and boldness blend in Cusi's Tycoon collection. Jewelry with innovative design and made from high-quality materials, designed for those who wish to express confidence and sophistication on every occasion.
prodotti.bollywood_description: Whether you're looking for a red carpet necklace or a ring that captures the festive spirit of Bollywood, every piece in the collection allows you to express your individuality with unparalleled grace.
prodotti.urania_description: The harmony of celestial orbits captured and impressed in jewelry by our master craftsmen.
prodotti.fleurie_description: Where elegance embraces the soul, transforming every woman into a precious, beloved, and special flower.

itemdetails.shipping&returns_descriptions: Returns and exchanges are free for online orders if requested within 30 days of delivery. Returns and exchanges can also be made in person at one of Maison's selected boutiques. Please call our personal consultants to coordinate these services. Customized, engraved, or damaged creations cannot be returned. Upon receiving the return, Maison will conduct a quality check. You will receive further information throughout the process, and the refund will be processed within 14 days.

maison.welcomeMessage: We will be delighted to welcome you so you can discover and try on your favorite creations.
maison.staffResponse: Our staff will respond Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 7 PM and Saturday from 9 AM to 5 PM.

maison.newsletter: Sign me up for the newsletter

story.intro: The historic jewelry house founded in 1886 by Annibale Cusi marked the beginning of an era that has lasted for five generations. In these 131 years, Cusi has become one of the most prestigious names among Italian jewelers.
story.birthDescription1: Annibale Cusi started working at a very young age as an apprentice in a workshop, where the craft was taught through practical experience from early childhood, working closely with goldsmith artisans. For Annibale, it was no different; he began at just 9 years old and quickly gained experience, distinguishing himself for his artistic talent and craftsmanship.
story.birthDescription2: The long period spent behind the goldsmith's bench allowed the young Annibale to master the trade, developing the courage and entrepreneurial skills that, at the age of 23 in 1886, led him to leave the workshop and open his own laboratory in Via della Farine in the heart of Milan, just a few steps from the Duomo and Teatro alla Scala.
story.quote: Every jewel has its story and represents today's luxury and the time we dedicate to ourselves. Whatever object you choose will be yours, unique and unrepeatable, just like your life.
story.wellBroochDescription1: In his Atelier at Via delle Farine, number 8, young Annibale laid the foundations that would, within a few years, establish the Cusi brand as one of the most appreciated by Milanese aristocracy and nobility.
story.wellBroochDescription2: The fervent arrival of Art Nouveau at the end of the 19th century revitalized the art of jewelry, referring to nature as the main inspirational subject. In Europe, it was a true revolution in art, and in Milan, the Liberty style promptly emerged. During those years of beauty, Cusi brought to life unique and extraordinary jewelry collections, using innovative materials and rare colored gemstones.
story.wellBroochLight: On the left, the famous Well Brooch in platinum and diamonds, along with its design, created by Annibale and still affectionately preserved by the Cusi family.
story.maryStuartNecklaceDescription: In 1906, Milan was the protagonist of the International Exhibition, a great success, with the participation of 40 states and nearly 5 million visitors to the city, a record for the time. In the section dedicated to Decorative Arts, Cusi exhibited its jewelry and won the Grand Prize with a masterpiece of goldsmith art, the necklace called “Mary Stuart”, a work that took two years of work by the workshop's artisans to create in “Platiuralium”, a special alloy invented by Cusi composed of platinum, gold, silver, and aluminum with unique lightness characteristics. The “Collar” was adorned with about 15,000 diamonds, pearls, and rubies. The architecture was complex as all parts were articulated, allowing for articulated movements. Those who wrote about it described it as, despite its grandeur, light as lace.
story.viaClericiDescription: After the painful parenthesis of the Great War 1915-18, Annibale Cusi, now an internationally renowned expert in precious stones and pearls, resumed his activity with renewed energy. Expansion became necessary, leading in 1922 Annibale and his twenty-seven-year-old son Rinaldo to build the elegant Palazzo Cusi at Via Clerici 1, the family's headquarters, sales atelier, and production laboratories. In 1921, Annibale was proclaimed a Knight of Labor.
story.rinaldoCusiDescription:
In the twentieth century, the Cusi brand was appreciated not only by the most important Milanese aristocratic families but also by the Italian Royal Family, boasting numerous collaborations for King Vittorio Emanuele III, with S.A.R. Vittorio Emanuele, Count of Turin, and Duke of Aosta Amedeo di Savoia. In those years, the three royal emblems adorned the letterhead and logo of the Cusi Jewelry.

With great skill and charisma, Rinaldo also exported our style abroad, where the international market responded with wide approval. Always a great expert and collector of jewelry, precious gems, and especially pearls, he handed over the reins of the company to his son Roberto Cusi.
story.robertoCusiDescription: Under Roberto Cusi (1926 – 1996), the company consolidated, and in 1964 the exclusive headquarters in Portofino was inaugurated, followed by the current headquarters in Milan at Via Montenapoleone 21 just two years later, a symbolic location for fashion and luxury worldwide. Subsequently, in 2004, at the Portofino branch, Cusi became an official ROLEX dealer, and in 2013, an Atelier was entirely dedicated to it next to its jewelry store.
story.familyTitle: The Cusi tradition continues with the new generations.
story.familyIntro: The historic jewelry house founded in 1886 by Annibale Cusi marked the beginning of an era that has lasted for five generations; in these 131 years, Cusi has become one of the most prestigious names among Italian jewelers.
story.familyDescription:
Today, the tradition continues thanks to the commitment and passion of Giorgio Nicola Cusi, his wife Roberta Cusi, and their children Alessia and Alessandro. Cusi is not just a name: it is passion, professionalism, security, tradition; it is something familiar. Our goal is to make our customers feel at home.

This brief retrospective recounts the history, evolution of the concept of jewelry, and how we are tied to tradition while maintaining the quality of the past and introducing a perspective of modernity and design. Italian haute jewelry, based on tradition and innovation, which can be admired at the locations on Via Montenapoleone and in Portofino, embodies the highest expressions of art such as design, craftsmanship, attention to detail, and the search for rare gems from the remotest corners of the earth. It is with this philosophy that the Cusi family wants to pass on the tradition to the new generations.

contactus.availability: Our personal consultants are available to answer any questions Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

ourservices_description: Welcome to our luxury jewelry boutique, where elegance meets craftsmanship. Our dedicated team is committed to providing you with an exceptional shopping experience, ensuring each piece of jewelry reflects the timeless beauty and sophistication you deserve.

Explore our curated collection of exquisite jewelry, handcrafted with the finest materials and attention to detail. From dazzling diamonds to rare gemstones, each piece tells a story of unparalleled luxury and style.
customerservice.productcare_description: Our luxurious jewelry pieces are crafted with precision and care. To preserve their beauty for generations, follow these product care guidelines:
productcare_guide: Store your jewelry in a soft pouch or box to prevent scratches.
Avoid exposing your jewelry to chemicals, perfumes, and cosmetics.
Clean your jewelry gently with a soft, lint-free cloth.
For specific care instructions, refer to the care guide provided with each item.
customerservice.productcare_description2: Investing in the proper care of your jewelry ensures that it remains a timeless treasure for years to come.
shipping_description: Immerse yourself in the luxury of our online boutique. Discover and shop our exquisite collection from the comfort of your home.
All orders are shipped with the utmost care and attention to detail. You will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking link to monitor the journey of your precious purchase.
Delivery times may vary, but rest assured, we strive to deliver your order promptly. During peak seasons, please allow for additional delivery time.
customerservice.returns_description: Returns and exchanges are free for orders placed online, if requested within 30 days of the delivery date. It is possible to make returns and exchanges in person at one of the Maison's selected boutiques. We invite you to call our personal advisors to coordinate the services. Customized, engraved, or damaged creations cannot be returned. After receiving the return, the Maison will conduct a quality check. You will receive further information throughout the entire process, and the refund will be processed within 14 days.
sizechart_description: Finding the perfect fit is essential when it comes to jewelry. Refer to our size chart to ensure your selected piece complements your style and comfort.
If you have any questions about sizing or need assistance, our customer service team is here to help. Reach out to us for personalized guidance.
garanzia_description: La nostra garanzia testimonia l'impegno nella qualità e nell'eccellenza. Tutti i nostri gioielli sono coperti da una garanzia che attesta la genuinità dei materiali e la maestria artigianale impiegata nella creazione di ciascun pezzo.
Per maggiori dettagli sulla garanzia e i suoi termini, contatta il nostro servizio clienti. Siamo qui per garantire la tua completa soddisfazione.
faq_description: Explore our frequently asked questions to find answers to common queries. Whether it's about our products, shipping, or returns, you'll likely find the information you need here.
If your question isn't covered in our FAQ section, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer service team. We're here to assist you.
contact_description: Our customer service team is <GrayClickableLink onClick={() => navigate('/contactus')}>here</GrayClickableLink> to assist you. If you have any questions, concerns, or need personalized assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.
You can reach us via email, phone, or by filling out the contact form on our website. We aim to respond promptly and ensure your experience with us is seamless.

sections.title: About Cusi and These Terms of Use
sections.content:
This site is managed by the Data Controller, identified in the person of the owner and legal representative of the company: 

CUSI MONTENAPOLEONE S.r.l.
registered office: Milano (MI), Via Montenapoleone, 21/A
VAT No. 01932840182
email: info@cusimontenapoleone.com

These terms of use ("Terms of Use") govern the use of Cusi's Platforms. By accessing and using the Platforms, you indicate your consent and acceptance of these Terms of Use. If you disagree with these Terms, you are not authorized to use the Platforms.

sections.title: Updates to These Terms of Use
sections.content: Periodically, we may make changes to these Terms of Use. We invite you to check regularly to stay updated. The latest version will always be available on the Platforms and will become effective immediately after publication. Continued use of the Platforms will constitute acceptance of such changes.

sections.title: Information About Our Hosting Services
sections.content: The hosting services for Cusi's website are provided by Netlify, Inc. located at 512 2nd Street, Suite 200 San Francisco, CA 94107.

sections.title: Our Privacy Policy
sections.content: Our data collection practices within the Cusi eCommerce platform are governed by the terms of our Privacy Policy made available by Iubenda. We invite you to read it to understand how we handle your data.

sections.title: Cusi e-Commerce – Terms of Sale
sections.content: Customers who make purchases online through our e-commerce should consult the Terms of Sale, which govern the terms and conditions of such transactions.

sections.title: Use of Content on the Platforms
sections.content: Cusi provides information about its products and services through this platform for the personal use of visitors. Visual representations of products are carefully created; however, there may be slight variations in color or design. We recommend visiting our stores or contacting us directly for more information before making a purchase. You may download or print content from the Platforms for personal, non-commercial use, provided that intellectual property rights are maintained intact and rights notices are not altered.

sections.title: Communications and Feedback
sections.content: We welcome your feedback and suggestions. Please send them to info@cusimontenapoleone.com. All communications sent to Cusi will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Cusi strives to provide accurate and complete information through this platform; however, it cannot guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the contents. Additionally, we do not assume responsibility for any damages resulting from the use of the Platforms or access to the contents. We do not guarantee that the functional and/or technical aspects of the Platforms or our material will be error-free, nor that the servers that make the Platforms available will be free of viruses or other harmful components. Should the use of the Platforms cause the need for assistance or the replacement of goods or data, Cusi will not be responsible for such costs.

sections.title: Notice on Trademarks and Copyright
sections.content: All trademarks and content present on the Platforms are the property of Cusi or used with authorization. It is strictly forbidden to use such trademarks or content without our written consent.

sections.title: Links and Connections
sections.content: The Platforms may contain links to third-party websites. Cusi is not responsible for the contents or privacy practices of such sites. Access to such sites is at your own risk.

sections.title: Termination and Suspension
sections.content: Cusi reserves the right to terminate or suspend access to the Platform for violations of these Terms of Use or for other reasons at our discretion.

sections.title: General Provisions
sections.content: These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and Cusi for the use of the Platforms. Any changes or waivers must be made in writing and signed by both parties.

sections.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
sections.content: These Terms of Use are governed and interpreted according to Italian law without reference to conflict of laws provisions. Any disputes will be resolved in court.

section1.title: PRIVACY INFORMATION AND WEBSITE USE
section1.content:
This information broadly describes the practices we have adopted.

This page describes the methods of managing the website concerning the processing of personal data of users who browse it. The processing is always based on principles of lawfulness and fairness in compliance with all current regulations, and adequate security measures are adopted to protect the data. This privacy notice is also provided as a brief notice pursuant to Art. 13 of Legislative Decree 196/2003 and pursuant to Art. 13 of GDPR 679/2016 European Privacy Regulation, as well as pursuant to the cookie provision No. 229 of May 8, 2014. We wish to inform site visitors about the use of the entered data and the cookies used by the site itself. The information is also provided pursuant to Recommendation No. 2/2001 adopted by the working group established by Art. 29 of Directive No. 95/46/EC for those who interact with the web services of this site, for the protection of personal data, accessible electronically at the address: By using any of our services and/or accepting this information, for example within the registration for one of our services, you consent to the collection and use of personal information as described in this notice.

section2.title: PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT
section2.content: In every occasion of contact or interaction with the guest and in all other aspects of our work, we may collect personal information. This personal information may include: your contact details; personal characteristics, nationality, identity documents, payment information, as well as billing and account details related to electronic invoicing; preferences, with your written consent, regarding marketing and communication, and we may send you commercial information with your explicit consent.

section3.title: PURPOSE OF PROCESSING
section3.content:
The data processing is aimed at the following purposes:

for managing customer relations (issuing invoices, quotes), to fulfill any contractual obligations, to handle disputes, and to comply with regulatory obligations, particularly those of accounting and taxation;

2a) Related to the service:

to send (with your written consent) promotional offers on our services and offers as well as greetings via regular mail or fax or email; Technical requests to adapt, complete, modify, or repair jewelry according to the customer's taste and their order, by phone, mail, fax

2b) Electronic receipt program:

we may automatically enroll you in our electronic receipt program and use your email address to send you invoices or fiscal receipts, or documents related to your purchase. It is your responsibility to ensure that the email address we have is correct (and preferred). We may use your email address to send you, with your written consent, our newsletters, our holiday greetings.

Additional purposes

The computer systems and software procedures used to operate this website acquire, during their normal operation, some personal data whose transmission is implicit in the use of Internet communication protocols. These data are not collected to be associated with identified subjects, but by their very nature could, through processing and associations with data held by third parties, allow users to be identified. This category of data includes the IP addresses or domain names of the computers used by users who connect to the site, the URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) addresses of the requested resources, the time of the request, the method used to submit the request to the server, the size of the file obtained in response, the numeric code indicating the status of the response given by the server (successful, error, etc.), and other parameters related to the user's operating system and computer environment. These data are used only to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the site and to check its correct functioning and are deleted immediately after processing. The data could also be used to ascertain responsibility in case of hypothetical computer crimes against the site.

section4.title: IDENTITY OF THE DATA CONTROLLER
section4.content:
This site is managed by the Data Controller, identified as the current owner and legal representative of the company:

CUSI MONTENAPOLEONE S.r.l.
registered office: Milan (MI), Via Montenapoleone, 21/A
VAT number 01932840182
email: info@cusimontenapoleone.com;

The Data Controller guarantees the security, confidentiality, and protection of the data it holds, at any stage of the processing. The data collected are used in compliance with current privacy regulations (Legislative Decree 196/2003 and GDPR 679/2016).

section5.title: PLACE OF PROCESSING
section5.content: The data will be processed by the data controller at the registered and operational office.

section6.title: NATURE OF DATA PROVISION
section6.content: For the purposes referred to in point 2, the provision of data is mandatory and failure to provide them may make it impossible to obtain what is requested. For the purposes referred to in points 2a) and 2b), the provision of data is optional and does not preclude the provision of the requested service.

section7.title: REFUSAL TO PROVIDE DATA
section7.content: The data subject can refuse to provide their browsing data to the Data Controller. To do so, they must disable cookies by following the instructions provided by the browser in use. Disabling cookies may impair the navigation functionality of the site.

section8.title: DATA RECIPIENTS
section8.content: No data deriving from the web service (therefore the navigation data specified above and cookies) are communicated or disseminated (except for communication to judicial or police authorities if necessary). The data are processed by personnel specifically appointed in writing to process the data (administrative and public relations staff, including external to the company, IT system management staff, including external to the company who may also perform system administrator functions and who in this case are appointed as such pursuant to the provision of the Privacy Guarantor and subsequent amendments, interns, our consultants and persons in charge of the specific management of IT systems, including external to the company) only if the processing is necessary for the performance of their duties, performing only the operations necessary for the performance of their duties.

section9.title: DATA SUBJECTS' RIGHTS
section9.content:
Pursuant to Art. 7 of the Privacy Code and Arts. 15 (right of access), 16 (right to rectification), 17 (right to erasure), 18 (right to restriction of processing), 20 (right to data portability), 21 (right to object) and 22 (right not to be subject to automated decision-making) of GDPR 679/2016, the data subject will exercise their rights by writing to the Data Controller at the address indicated above or by email to info@cusimontenapoleone.com, and will have the right to obtain without delay, from the Data Controller, information on the existence of personal data processing concerning them, on the purposes, on the methods of processing, on the logic applied in case of processing carried out with the aid of electronic instruments, on the identification details of the Data Controller and the data processors, on the subjects or categories of subjects to whom personal data may be communicated or who may become aware of them as data processors or persons in charge.

The data subject has the right to obtain the updating, rectification or, when interested, the integration of data, the erasure, anonymization or blocking of data processed unlawfully, including data whose retention is unnecessary for the purposes for which the data were collected or subsequently processed, the certification that the operations referred to in letters a) and b) have been brought to the attention, also as regards their content, of those to whom the data have been communicated or disseminated, except where this fulfillment proves impossible or involves a disproportionate use of means compared to the protected right.

The data subject has the right to object, in whole or in part:

a) for legitimate reasons to the processing of personal data concerning them, even if pertinent to the purpose of the collection;

b) to the processing of personal data concerning them for the purpose of sending advertising material or direct sales or for carrying out market research or commercial communication.

section10.title: COOKIES
section10.content: Cookies are small text files that are sent to your computer. This site uses the following third-party technical cookies: Google Analytics. This site does not use profiling cookies. The computer systems and software procedures used to operate this website acquire, during their normal operation, some personal data whose transmission is implicit in the use of Internet communication protocols. These data are not collected to be associated with identified subjects, but by their very nature could, through processing and associations with data held by third parties, allow users to be identified.

section11.title: Google Analytics
section11.content:
Our site uses Google Analytics from Google, Inc. (hereinafter 'Google') to generate statistics on website usage; Google Analytics uses cookies (not third-party cookies) that do not store personal data. The information obtained from cookies on the website usage by users (including IP addresses) will be transmitted by the user's browser to Google, located at 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, United States, and stored on the company's servers.

In accordance with the current service conditions, Google will use this information, as an independent data controller, to track and examine website usage, compile reports on website activities for site operators, and provide other services related to website activities, connection methods (mobile, PC, browsers used, etc.), and methods of searching and reaching website pages. Google may also transfer this information to third parties where required by law or where such third parties process the information on Google's behalf. Google will not associate users' IP addresses with any other data held by Google. By using this site, the user consents to the processing of their data by Google in the manner and for the purposes indicated above.

Under a specific agreement (DPA), Google Analytics has been set to anonymize the IP addresses of users visiting our website. Anonymization involves masking the last part of the visitor's IP address, making it impossible to trace the individual user.

The transmission of such data is governed by a specific agreement between the company and Google Inc. For more information on Google's data protection policies, you can consult the following link: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=it.
